backend/main.mo: Main actor defining authorization, storage mixins, data types, maps, and query/mutation functions for test benches, documents, components, history, and user profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to a new format, primarily upgrading user profiles to include new fields like username, displayName, bio, and avatarUrl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing implemented features, affected files, components, and requirement IDs with high-confidence links to profile and i18n updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose, functionality, and UI roles in the application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template that mounts the React application and loads the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app setup including routing, theming, query client, internationalization provider, and global app shell.
Admin-only access gate that checks admin status and blocks unauthorized users with a permission error alert.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and shows a reloadable error alert.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Handles backend actor loading state and errors, showing spinners or alerts before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Blocks access until user identity is loaded and authenticated, displaying loading or error messages.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Renders a draggable list UI with drag handlers and visual feedback for reordering items.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: Hook managing item order and drag state, updating the list as items are dragged.
Main app layout with navigation, theme toggle, logout handling, and outlet rendering.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows buttons to scroll to top or bottom based on page scroll position.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Input for selecting or typing a single entity tag with suggestions and tag removal.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Grid selector for predefined avatar images with highlighting of the selected option.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Displays a user avatar from predefined or custom sources with size options and cache busting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instance based on identity, handling initialization and query invalidation.
Zustand store providing a timestamp to force avatar image cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Stores and persists preferred dashboard chart type in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, including identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
Sends periodic updateLastSeen calls to the backend when an actor and identity are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping actor methods for fetching and mutating user, bench, and settings data.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Context provider managing language selection, loading preferences from backend, and saving updates.
frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts: Defines supported language metadata and a lookup helper by code.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains translation dictionaries for multiple languages covering common UI strings.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Hook exposing current language, setter, loading state, and a translation function.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabbed panels for managing benches, documents, and users.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Displays all test benches with loading state and supports deleting a bench via confirmation dialog.
Lists all documents and allows downloading each file, with loading and error handling.
Shows the logged-in user's profile information with loading and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Provides detailed view of a single bench including components, documents, history, editing, and deletion features.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Displays searchable list of all benches and opens a modal to add a new bench.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Modal form for creating a new bench with fields for metadata, photo upload, documents, tags, and component duplication.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Manages adding, editing, displaying, and removing bench components with expiration status and optional duplication actions.
Handles uploading, listing, versioning, and deleting documents for a bench, including blob upload and association logic.
Displays sorted bench history entries with user info, timestamps, and optional details.
Renders a bench photo with loading and error fallback behavior.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Allows selecting document categories and managing files with versions for each category.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Provides a dialog to duplicate a component to selected benches, with selection and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Modal for editing bench details, tags, and photo with validation and update submission.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Tag input component allowing users to add, remove, and select tags with autocomplete suggestions.
Placeholder page describing planned features for creating a new bench.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Generates a pie chart summarizing component expiration status across benches.
Displays a bar chart showing counts of components by criticality, optionally filtered by bench.
Builds a bar chart grouping components by expiration deadlines with selectable time ranges and bench filter.
Renders a pie chart showing document counts grouped by category.
Charts monthly component expiration counts using either bar or line format.
Shows top benches with expired components using a bar or line chart.
Displays overall component health percentages and counts using progress bars, handling empty data gracefully.
Renders reorderable dashboard statistic and chart cards, loading saved ordering from local storage.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page fetching benches, components, and documents, computing expiration statuses, and rendering dashboard sections with reordering support.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page allowing editing personal info, thresholds, avatar settings, and saving preferences with validation.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Signâ€‘in UI using Internet Identity with error handling and a login button.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Maps avatar IDs to asset paths and provides helpers to retrieve avatar paths and IDs.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a file as an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Fetches and converts a default bench placeholder image into an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Downloads an ExternalBlob as a file by generating a temporary URL and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes unknown errors into readable messages, preserving meaningful backend details when possible.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration thresholds with localStorage fallback and computes expiration status based on dates.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates a unique string ID using timestamp and random characters.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Applies deterministic text cleanup, capitalization, abbreviation normalization, and punctuation fixes to descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Searches test benches by matching query terms against name, code, description, and tags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state retention.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides validation helpers for email, domain-limited email, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node build scripts with ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, env var injection, path aliases, dev proxy, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Describes project state, feature requirements, known issues, and pending profile-related feature requests.
